description: Smartwool's Hunt Medium Crew is designed to provide you with all-day comfort, so you can stay focused for the entire hunt. It's a cushioned sock that provides cushioning through the foot and leg. Featuring their Smartwool® 2 Degree fit system with elasticized arch and ankle support designed to keep the sock in place, a flat knit toe seam for extra comfort, and a taller crew height to accommodate a wide range of hunting boots, these men's hunting socks are ready to hunt for as long as you desire.
name: Smartwool Hunt Classic Edition Full Cushion Tall Crew Socks- Mens
